item.title: SAP Launches Big Data-Enabled Apps
item.description: The SAP Customer Engagement Intelligence software includes four applications designed to handle different levels of customer interaction in the sales, marketing and customer service process.
item.author: Jennifer Morrell

item.title: Verisk Underwriting Announces New Fraud Screening Technology
item.description: Designed to analyze every new policy earlier in the lifecycle, the new software is intended to reduce insurers fraud and rate evasion losses.
item.author: Justin Stephani
item.source: Verisk Underwriting Announces New Fraud Screening Technology

item.title: What’s Threatening P&C Insurers’ Growth in 2014?
item.description: Insurance executives at the 2013 PCI annual meeting say geographic expansion will drive growth, but that growth could be dampened by undisciplined underwriting and other threats.
item.author: Carrie Burns
item.source: What’s Threatening P&C Insurers’ Growth in 2014?

item.title: Google, Oracle Engineers Enlisted for Obamacare Tech Surge
item.description: Kathleen Sebelius, the U.S. Health and Human Services secretary, said her agency has pulled in outside help to achieve an optimally functioning exchange by the end of November.
item.author: Alex Wayne
item.source: Google, Oracle Engineers Enlisted for Obamacare Tech Surge

item.title: Execs Wary of Growing Skills Gaps, Especially in IT
item.description: Just more than half of executives, in a recent survey, anticipate increased investments in training to reduce the gap, as 35 percent admit they have not invested enough in the past.
item.author: Justin Stephani
item.source: Execs Wary of Growing Skills Gaps, Especially in IT

item.title: Regulatory Reform Resulting in Collateral and Liquidity Shortfalls
item.description: BNY Mellon/Risk Insurance survey finds more than half of global insurers have insufficient investment collateral; funding costs and operational complexity are on the rise.
item.author: Chris McMahon
item.source: Regulatory Reform Resulting in Collateral and Liquidity Shortfalls

item.title: Digital Benefit Advisors Launches Private Exchange in Texas
item.description: The exchange is designed so companies can begin enrolling a week after deciding to convert to the system.
item.author: Jennifer Morrell
item.source: Digital Benefit Advisors Launches Private Exchange in Texas

item.title: AIR Catastrophe Modeling Platforms Certified by ACORD
item.description: Touchstone and CATRADER certified for implementation of ACORD's property exposure standards for delegated authority reporting and aggregated reporting.
item.author: Jennifer Morrell
item.source: AIR Catastrophe Modeling Platforms Certified by ACORD

item.title: Customer Centricity: Insurers Must Make the Leap
item.description: Customer-centric business models will require several technology initiatives, four of which make up Ovums biggest trends for 2014.
item.author: Justin Stephani
item.source: Customer Centricity: Insurers Must Make the Leap

item.title: USAA Shines Among Top 25 Insurers for Auto Claims Satisfaction
item.description: Claims satisfaction is up three points overall thanks to better scores for the first notice of loss process and faster claims payments.
item.author: Justin Stephani
item.source: USAA Shines Among Top 25 Insurers for Auto Claims Satisfaction

item.title: 8 Insurers Release Q3 Financials
item.description: The Hartford, CNA, Willis and five others announce quarterly results.
item.author: Chris McMahon

item.title: 10 Most-Stolen Sports Vehicles
item.description: Chevy Camaros are by far the most popular model among sports car thieves, and the Los Angeles area has seen more sports vehicle thefts in the last four years than any other.
item.author: Justin Stephani

item.title: 8 Insurers Release Q3 Financials
item.description: The Hartford, CNA, Willis and five others announce quarterly results.
item.author: Chris McMahon

item.title: Insurers Oppose Obamacare Extension as a Danger to Profits
item.description: Republicans in Congress, along with at least 10 Democrats, have suggested enrollment be extended beyond its current March 31 deadline.
item.author: Shannon Pettypiece and Alex Wayne
item.source: Insurers Oppose Obamacare Extension as a Danger to Profits

item.title: Nationwide Looking for Agents in Texas
item.description: In the midst of recent discussions on the future of insurance agents, the insurer plans to add to its 3,200 independent-contractor exclusive agents.
item.author: Justin Stephani
item.source: Nationwide Looking for Agents in Texas
